resources.title: Kino
resources.description: Kino is a collection of custom post-processing effects for Unity's High Definition Render Pipeline (HDRP)

resources.title: X-PostProcessing Library
resources.description: High-quality open source post-processing library for Unity engine, aims to provide the industry's mainstream high-quality post-processing effects

resources.title: Image Effects for Unity
resources.description: A collection of fullscreen image effects for Unity, all of which run in real-time

resources.title: RetroSuite3D
resources.description: Some image effects and shaders to achieve a retro look in Unity

resources.title: Light Leaks Image Effect (by danielzeller)
resources.description: Light Leak Image Effect for unity, with settings for red, yellow, blue, intensity and two different blend modes

resources.title: Dynamic Central Line Camera (by MizoTake)
resources.description: A collection of fullscreen image effects for Unity, all of which run in real-time

resources.title: KinoFeedback (by keijiro)
resources.description: Oldskool frame buffer feedback effect for Unity

resources.title: KinoBloom (by keijiro)
resources.description: Bloom is an image effect for Unity that adds bloom/veiling glare effect to rendered frames

resources.title: SonarFX (by keijiro)
resources.description: SonarFx is a full-screen effect for Unity. It renders animated wave-like patterns on the all surfaces in the scene

resources.title: KinoGlitch (by keijiro)
resources.description: KinoGlitch is a collection of glitch video effects. At the moment, it provides two types of glitch effects

resources.title: Water Color Filter (by nobnak)
resources.description: Tone-based diffuse shading, wobbing, edge darkening, paper effect

resources.title: Binary (by keijiro)
resources.description: Binary is a binary image (thresholding/dithering) filter for Unity

resources.title: Light Shafts (by Robcupisz)
resources.description: A light shafts (aka light scattering, aka volumetric shadows) effect for Unity

resources.title: Screen Space God Rays (by Math-araujo)
resources.description: Implementation of the paper 'Volumetric Light Scattering as a Post-Process' using OpenGL 4.5

resources.title: 2D Water surface(reflections) in Unity3D (by valryon)
resources.description: A simple shader + example of a water surface with reflection in 2D

resources.title: KinoFog (by keijiro)
resources.description: KinoFog is a replacement for the global fog effect in the Unity standard assets. The main difference is the addition of the fade-to-skybox mode

resources.title: UnityFx.Outline
resources.description: UnityFx.Outline implements configurable per-object and per-camera outlines. Both solid and blurred outline modes are supported (Gauss blur)

resources.title: Pixel Perfect Outline Article (by Doug Valenta)
resources.description: An utility to tweak matcaps, with realtime visual feedback

resources.title: Rendering Outline Article (by Alexander Ameye)
resources.description: Different techniques for rendering outlines in Unity

resources.title: URP Outlines (by Robinseibold)
resources.description: A custom renderer feature for screen space outlines based on Erik Roystan Ross Outline Shader

resources.title: Contour (by keijiro)
resources.description: Contour is a contour line (edge detection) filter for Unity

resources.title: Cavifree - cavity and curvature (by Federicocasares)
resources.description: Cavifree is a screen space post-processing effect for Unity that mimics the cavity viewport effect found in Blender
